title: Loopstudio landing page
description: This is a simple responsive landing page build with html, tailwindcss and a bit of JS for the mobile menu.

title: Calculator App
description: This project is a simple calculator app with color theme switching

title: Hulu Clone
description: This is a rebuild of a Hulu movie site. This project is built using the TMDB API and showcase movies based on categories with details on each movie.

title: Rest Countries Search
description: This is a SPA who displays countries and details about each of them. Dark Mode and country filtration are also included

title: WindBnb
description: This project is a very simple AirBnb clone. It allows the user to filter between differents city in Finland and differents guests count

title: iNOTES
description: In this project i wanted to try to recreate APPLE's iNotes app with Vanilla JS. You can add - edit - delete and search notes quickly and easily. It's fully responsive and I've also implemented local storage

title: Newflix
description: This is a netflix clone where you can sign in or sign up (firebase auth). The browse page show  movies or series, from TheMovieDB api, which you can add to your list (cloud firestore). The styling has been done with twin.macro which combines tailwind and styled-components

title: Proshop
description: This is an ecoomerce website built from scratch with the MERN stack. You can proceed to dumy purchase, manage (CRUD operation) users, orders and products as an admin.

title: Spotify clone
description: This project is a clone of Spotify web app using NextJS. You can login with your spotify account, play songs from your playlists and liked songs. This project use the Spotify API to work
